title: Points of instruction for the ignorant as also, an expositition on the ten commandements, and the Lords Prayer, by questions and answeres. With an examination before our comming to the Lords table. And a short direction for spending of time well. By Robert Horne.
author: Horne, Robert, 1565-1640.
publisher: Printed by George Purslowe for Francis Burton, and are to bee sold at his shop, at the signe of the Greene Dragon,
